build.name: Full Passive Priest (Keyholder Build)
build.descr: Allocate all points to passive to maximise as keyholder. There will be some leftover point, can keep it for later when level gap increase. This build, your priest key must always be at 100% activation.

build.name: Magnify Priest (Keyholder Build)
build.descr: This build is more of a magnify build with some point allocate to awakened passive. The reason for this is mainly because of World Boss (especially shariet) magnify is still quite relevant to get high score. With some investment to awakend passive, this build can be use as keyholder (for those always set key activation at 1%, esspecially in WB)

build.name: Guidance Magnify TYPE-1
build.descr: Offensive build for any Non Buster Mode. With Mastering guidance your team will be fully protected from any debuff (full Immunity) and with magnify to boost party ATK & ATK.SPD for short burst to clear enemy team. On thing to take note, if you are using this build, it is better to make your priest as tanky as possible by using STR set and Focus on getting more HP and EVA on her. This build not really using priest as healer but a buffer + cleanser.

build.name: Guidance Magnify TYPE-2
build.descr: Offensive build for any Non Buster Mode. Similar to previous TYPE-1 but instead of mastering guidance, you mastered the Magnify. Bigger burst power (while magnify) than TYPE-1, but you are more vulnarble to debuff. Clearance lvl 13 is able to clear debuff (for whole team) and cast protection (DEF+39% & Full Immunity) for 10 sec for you and another team member with shorter CD than level 14 Guidance. Same as TYPE-1, if you are going for these build, need to take note that your priest role not really a Healer but instead a Buffer & Cleanser, so it is better to build her tanky (All Defensive build & STR Set).

build.name: Hybrid Healer TYPE-1
build.descr: Defensive Build. MASTERED Guidance and lvl-11 Charming Light. The reason for these setup is for mass debuff clear + immunity protection and DEF ++ for whole party with mastering guidance while having some AoE Heal (splash 50%) from charming light. Balance build for Priest usage in the area where no Key is allowed. Totally ignore awakened passive. This build is for Hero mode (GB & Arena). This build is only adviseable if you have second skill tab or not using your priest as keyholder for any DS/DB.

build.name: Hybrid Healer TYPE-2
build.descr: Defensive Build. MASTERED Charming Light and lvl-11 Guidance. Reason: by mastering charming light, your healing will increase alot + continuous healing. Moreover, with guidance at lvl 11, you will have mass debuff clearing for cleansing you team from bad status (lower CD than Mastering Guidance 4 sec vs 6 sec). A good build for area where key is not allowed. Totally ignore awakened passive. This build is for Hero mode (GB & Arena) This build is only adviseable if you have second skill tab or not using your priest as keyholder for any DS/DB.

build.name: Sheeping KeyHolder
build.descr: Sheeping build that include some Awakened passive. can be use for both mode of PVP (hero and buster). This is the only build that is balanced between Key and Non keyholder. coz if you specialize in the 1st or 2nd active, it will be good to add more in 3rd general passive.

build.name: Meteor Keyholder
build.descr: Similar to previous build, but instead of sheeping, you focus on meteor active. Good AoE DMG for both buster and hero mode in game.

build.name: Flame Burst Keyholder
build.descr: Similar to previous 2 build, but instead of sheeping and meteor, you focus on flame burst active. High DMG and Skill CD Reset upon critical make this build quite deadly in single point kill in PVP.

build.name: All-Rounder Mage Type-1
build.descr: Balance build that is aim to be all rounder in all type of PVP (Hero & Buster). Ult your Sheeping as CROWD-CONTROL, then Master your Meteor. these 2 skill be use on Arena & GB (Hero). Max first and 2nd passive, then allocate some points into awakened passive.

build.name: All-Rounder Mage Type-2
build.descr: Balance build that is aim to be all rounder in all type of PVP (Hero & Buster). Ult your Sheeping as CROWD-CONTROL, then Master your Flame burst instead. This build is more purely focus in Guild Battle. Max first and 2nd passive, then allocate some points into awakened passive.

build.name: Meteor Mage

infos.descr: Paladin is an interesting class that are able to switch between stance (ATK/DEF). On ATK-STANCE, he is able to deal massive burst dmg with full justice and skills that Stuns and Slow target atk.Spd, make him a good choice to use in Arena/GB. When on def stance, he could be healer and protector of the team by casting a HP Shield. This Huge HP Shield is like an added HP for the team and make them hard to kill. Using some specific build, paladin could also be a main healer which is super tanky.
infos.normalAtkEffect: Stun target at set chance when Normal ATK.

build.name: Sword/Healer Paladin
build.descr: ATK-STANCE: Best to use in GB-Hero. with full justice it is able to deal alot of dmg. DEF-STANCE: Very good healer in dungeon. Tanky and able to withstand most of the mobs atk. Give pt extra DEF buff to keep them alive.

build.name: Buffer Paladin (Keyholder Build)
build.descr: Current build for keyholder paladin. 3rd active seem to carry forward when transform to key0unit, that why ult it for maximise buff aura for then team. The Heal passive is rumour to be carry over and effect the heal amount if use on Askr. There should be some amount points left, allocate them to active skills or last passive as you may see fit.

build.name: Fist/Shield Paladin
build.descr: Glorious light is a good offensive and CROWD-CONTROL skill. if on judgement mode, it is a good AoE Burst with full Justice. if on protection mode, it is also create a very strong HP Shield buff to protect allies. All rounded build. Good in GB and Arena. Some prefer to add more in first passive for more def, some goes all in offensive by adding more in 2nd passive. choice is up to you.

build.name: KeyHolder Paladin
build.descr: This build is widely use in arena (Buster). But there are few variation, if you wan to be more tanky (like i did), add more point into first character passive. If you want to more offensive add into passive 2. Passive 3 is a must max, coz it increase skill DMG with is good carry onto key transform.

build.name: Full Offense Paladin
build.descr: This build is full offensive paladin what maximise the DMG output that can be done by paladin. 1st active is one of the major damaging skill of paladin due to its explosive power and low cooldown, With level 13 of that skill, you will be dealing massive dmg in short CD. Coupled with Mastering (lvl 14) of 2nd active, you will be able to Stun all enemies and dealing big dmg at the same time. The 3nd active add it to level 10 in order to buff whole pt with ATK boost (+44%). Main draw back of this is the sacrifice of big DEF that Paladin had.

build.name: Shielding/Stunner Paladin
build.descr: This build is mainly use on both Hero mode of GB & Arena. Build around the 2nd active of paladin that stuns enemies and deal continous DMG as well as on Def-Stance for Protection of allies. Totally ignore all the keyholder passive. This build is for those with 2nd skill tab or you are not using paladin as keyholder.

build.name: Repentance Stunner/Healer Paladin
build.descr: This build is mainly for GB and Arene Hero mode. It make use of High DMG & CD of Repentance + Mass Stunning of Glorious Ligth as main selling point, on Def-Stance he can also do major HP Sheilding + Mass Healing. Totatlly ignore awakened passive. This build is for those with 2nd skill tab or you are not using paladin as keyholder.

deity.notes: She is one of the most sought after deity in Dragon blaze. When she was released on KR, she break all the chart in all the area of the game. She is a big meta changer for all game mode and remain meta for as long as i can remember. Base on some experiment run by various redditor that played on KR, she is better off with INT base set (Gems, Equipment and Card) due to her ability to stuns and deal additional DMG to stun target. Build her with high Accuracy stats so that she wont miss (stuns as well). She have huge STA(HP) and active-2 make her survivality high without needing to pump more def, if you prefer to build her offensive, use INT base gear on her. Of course you could also build her high base ATK and DEF with STR base items and cards, this will make her tankier but not as tank as full fledge tanker (she is more DPS than Tank/Support). In my opinion, STR base item is good if you intend to use her as KeyHolder for Askr/Omega.

skills.title: Double Soul Gem

infos.descr: Morgana is the keeper of the Cursed Stone, a culmination of sacrificed souls and the reaper of death. She swings her large death sythe and traps them inside a Cursed Stone fragment to use those soulds as preys. The painful screams of the souls who become preys to the radiant light are music to her ears.

An enemy that turns into the Dark Fragment receives 100% DMG that morgana receives. Morgana can only turn enemies into a fragment if they are in the same or lower Enhancement Level. Cannot dispel Dark Fragment.

infos.descr: The existance of Askr, the very first Dark Soul, is unknown even to other Dark Souls, and is undocumented in the ancient records. Ask's hammers, Ahura and Angra, observe both good and evil to judge and bless with their own will. However, only Askr knows if he will bring total destruction or new creation into this world.

infos.descr: Giants are referred to as the twelve gods of war in the Ancient War Song. Atlas is decribed as a fierce entity with flaming eyes that penetrate through the lives of enemies and fiery fists that destroy any obstacle. The symbolic ever-burinng flame represents her will.
infos.natk: Removes one beneficial buff from target.

The target will be deemed dead if the battle is finished before the 30 sec period. Boss-Type units are not affected by the blow but take additional 3418% damage form this Skill.

infos.descr: In the songs of the Ancient War, during the war of the Gods, it was said that the sky rained red with fire. Though the world was covered in flame, Tethys was the only one who stood untouched by the emebers. ally.name: Shinning Sword Loki
ally.descr: He is the only one recognized by the Orcs as the victor of ancient Azur.

ally.name: Captain Fulson
ally.descr: Guardian Captain Fulson rose to his position based on his unrivaled combat skills.

ally.name: Dark Elf Lucienne
ally.descr: Lucienne is quite the thief and has a penchant for stealing strong weapons or sturdy armor.

ally.name: Hero King Gram
ally.descr: Born half-Titan and half-Human, he possesses powers that could challenge even the gods.
ally.natk: Disables skills at a set chance.

ally.name: Orc Warrior Ackard
ally.descr: Azur's father Ackard, known as the Blade Master, was a legendary gladiator who disappeared.

ally.name: High Commander Patta
ally.descr: He is the greatest warrior in the kingdom. He is always cheerful but his past remains unknown.

ally.name: Dark Elf Tinulvian
ally.descr: Tinuvian isn't like the others; she shoots arrows while in motion.

ally.name: Aura Windlune
ally.descr: Princess Aura Windlune's brilliant archery skills are comparable to Bloodwind.

ally.name: Rollo the Princess of Varman
ally.descr: Princess Rollo has a small figure, but no one takes her lightly especially after the explosion in her lab wiped out half the castle.

ally.name: Captain Shabelle
ally.descr: Shabelle is a Porori that rose to become Guardian Captain. She is the Alliant Force's greatest healer.

ally.name: Princess Mercedes
ally.descr: As King Gram's beautiful daughter, the power of light within her surpasses human limitations.

ally.name: Calgar Wolf of Death
ally.descr: The elders of Ironwolf Tribe all say the same thing about Calgar: His birth flipped the food chain.

ally.name: Belle Snow
ally.descr: Although her own past is shrouded in mystery, she possesses an encyclopedic of knowledge of the world.

ally.name: Yvante the Incubus
ally.descr: Yvante has the strongest spell to control strongest Imp.
ally.natk: Provides the Seal of Darkness to increase the damage if his normal attacks persist.

ally.name: The Flame Wizard Whay
ally.descr: Whay invokes Torq, a phoenix whose power rivals that of dragons. She communicates with Torq flawlessly.

ally.name: Knight Tiel
ally.descr: Knight Tiel was in the battle against Ragnarok. She never liked the Quinque Draco.

ally.name: Commander Azur
ally.descr: Supreme Commander Azur is the most powerful mortal beings. His power rivals that of King Gram.

ally.name: Karang
ally.descr: Karang, the legendary White Gnoll, killed a bear at the age of 10 to become the Gold Gnoll. He is currently training to become even stronger.

ally.name: Captain Turq
ally.descr: The daughter of the noble Turq family, Captain Turq was a prodigy. She is as proud as she is beautiful.

ally.name: Dark Elf Eirden
ally.descr: Eirden studied invocations until her family was killed by a demon. Now she stops invocations.
ally.natk: Increases Arcane damage for her normal attack.

ally.name: Lilith the Succubus
ally.descr: Lilith doesn't worry about her enemies. Once they fall under her spell, she sucks their strength away.

ally.name: Knock Knock Gnoll
ally.descr: Fiery Land Gnoll became faster and crueler to survive harsh environments. Since they gave up their obsession on females, they are set to become even greater.

ally.name: Punisher Rar
ally.descr: Rar is a famous Orc gladiator. The story of how he single-handedly escaped captivity under 100 human soldiers is legendary.

ally.name: Divine Shield Menor
ally.descr: The strong soldiers that guard the Fortress Battle are fiercely loyal to Kymael. They are fearlessly armed with the pride of protecting an archangelus.

ally.name: Sorcerer Theros
ally.descr: Theros is a genius sorcerer who got to where he is through talent. As an old friend of Calgar's, he's one of the few allowed to criticize him.

ally.name: Ranger Kay
ally.descr: Ranger Kay's natural abilities were revealed at an early age. Her arrows never miss, but somehow they always avoid hitting handsome young men.

ally.name: Gar
ally.descr: Gar is the strong and cruel Chief of the Dark Gnolls. His dream is to marry a beautiful human woman, but he hasn't had much luck.

ally.name: Dark Swordsman Pagu
ally.descr: Covert Swordsman Pagu of the King's Royal Guards has trained to become an expert in combat. He is cold and objective in any situation.

ally.name: Dark Gnarl
ally.descr: Dark Gnarls, with their ranged explosive attacks, are a significant threat in battle. They commonly attack farms and carry off the women.

ally.name: Dark Gnoll
ally.descr: Dark Gnolls receive their steel armor and weaponry from their allies, the Orcs. Their savagery is suppressed only in the presence of beautiful women.

ally.name: Archer Ur
ally.descr: Ur is an elite Orc archer whose nimble bow carries the force of cannon balls. The mere sound of his unique arrows strike fear into his enmies.

ally.name: Scrunch Gnarl
ally.descr: Mage Gnarl who always got picked on for being small and weak gained a great power called Crinkle while playing with strange machines in the Fiery Land one day.

ally.name: Sorcerer Mer
ally.descr: Mer, known as the White Wolf, is a respected sorcerer among Orcs. He is Azur's right-hand man and his good reputation is widespread.

ally.name: Queen Caberra
ally.descr: Queen Caberra is cruel and despises all humans. She will do anything and everything to protect the spear of the ancient god, Longinus.

ally.name: Healer Konfi
ally.descr: Healer Konfi is a talented healer who serves Queen Robellia. She is confused as to why her heart flutters when she is near the queen.

ally.name: Black Dino Tyran
ally.descr: Black Dino Tyrant, the Supreme Commander of the Reptilians, is the best warrior of the Dragon Allied Forces, along with Commander Azur.

ally.name: Commander Cannon
ally.descr: The greedy energy that surrounds the Ivory Grave turns even the most honorable orc hero extremely bloodthirsty. Their axes cut through flesh and suck life away.

ally.name: Kerr
ally.descr: Captain Gnoll paints his body in black and aspires to be a merciless slayer. He claims that he's the strongest, but he secretly fears Mage Gnoll.

ally.name: Archer Pelas
ally.descr: Pelas is said to be the best Archer in the land. Though people whish he'd stop talking about archery, they admit that he is extremely good.

ally.name: Dark Mage Pari
ally.descr: Dark Mage Pari is capable of incinerating the enemy with her magic. Referred to as the Fire Witch, she strikes fear into the hearts of all.

ally.name: Dark Assassin Percy
ally.descr: Dark Assassin Percy, from the King's royal guards, is a cold-blooded killing machine. None that he has targeted have escaped death thus far.

ally.name: Captain Freya
ally.descr: Freya is the gladiator amongst the Dark Elves. She dons the greatest armor and sword and fears no one.

ally.name: Divine Touch Sammy
ally.descr: Hand-selected by Kymael, they are specialists who handle divine powers. Their warm embrace heals the body and soul.

ally.name: Dark Arrow Farq
ally.descr: As a legendary archer of the dark elves, she has great admiration for Bloodwind. This is secret she keeps to herself.

ally.name: Dark Archer Pitch
ally.descr: Dark Archer Pitch is powerful and sophisticated. Also known as the Dark Witch, she maintains unwavering focus while attacking her enemies.

ally.name: Nitredem the Incubus
ally.descr: Nitredem, the most powerful warrior has protected the tribe until the end, even when it fell to the dark side. Nitredem's strong will is the reason that the tribe was able to continue its bloodline in the current region.

ally.name: Corrupt Spirit Helter Skelter
ally.descr: Dead Orc Sorcerers communicate with spirits and study souls, while spotting danger and opportunity with their sorcery. Their deep connection between the living and dead has made them much more powerful than their living counterparts.

ally.name: Commander Garotan
ally.descr: A true monster of the Ironwolf Tribe. He was born with natural girth, strength, and spirit.

ally.name: Lagner
ally.descr: King Lagner is the ruler of Varman and the country's best warrior. His overflowing love for his family and citizens motivate him to protect his country regardless of the circumstances.

ally.name: Dark Knife Freyd
ally.descr: Freyd is the greatest fighter of the Dark Elves. She became famous for challenging Supreme Commander Azur to a fight.

ally.name: Divine Judgment Melki
ally.descr: The divine archers receive harsh training to protect the Divine Fortress. None of them has defeated Llywelyn the Fiery yet, but don't undererstimate their skills.

ally.name: Dark Marble Pearla
ally.descr: Cruel Pearla is a top-rate Mage of the Dark Elves. Even as a child, she would let the flames of her rage engulf anyone who crossed her.

ally.name: Pirate King Byron
ally.descr: Byron, the older brother of Black Dino Tyran, yearns for the sea.

ally.name: Mara the Succubus
ally.descr: Mara is Lilith's sister, but they don't get along. Unlike her sister, she cares for her fellow Demons.

ally.name: Lyna the Queen of Varman
ally.descr: 'If you can handle my punches, I'll think about marrying you.' King Lagner had been tied to a bed for a month after that incident, but he still recounts that day as the best day of his life.
ally.natk: Critical rate increases during a normal attack.

ally.name: Ertanible the Incubus
ally.descr: Ertanible's familiar spirits are far more superior than the others who fell over to the dark side. These spirits do not forgive those who stand against Ertanible.

ally.name: Dark Priest Porin
ally.descr: Dark Priest Porin is able to foresee danger and offer support to her allies. She is always objective and controls the power of light.

ally.name: Thryl the Succubus
ally.descr: Thryl's fatal attractiveness steals the opponent's energy to brutally violate them. Even after opening her eyes to the power of darkness, the allure remains in tact.

ally.name: Dmitri the Incubus
ally.descr: If any Succubi or Incubi get injured, High Commander Dmitri wil avenge them personally.

ally.name: Brightspark
ally.descr: She is the most powerful mage and the only one of the Quinque Draco with interest in the human world.

ally.name: Rogue Un
ally.descr: Un isn't as fine as Loki, but is one of the strongest swordsmen of the High Elves.

ally.name: Sarahama the Succubus
ally.descr: Thryl's younger sister Sara loves her tribe unlike Thryl. Even after opening her eyes to the power of darkness, her heart for her tribe remains the same.

ally.name: Deathcrown
ally.descr: One of the Quinque Draco, his power is enough to bring a thriving kingdom to ruins.

ally.name: Spark Wizard Ann
ally.descr: Ann is the daughter of the High Elf Whaya family, who worships the Phoenix. A talented spiritist, she communicates with all phoenixes.

ally.name: Knight Ari
ally.descr: She puts her confidence in the Quinque Draco unlike her rival Tiel.
ally.natk: Stuns target at a set rate.

ally.name: Windlune the Dark
ally.descr: Ragnarok has corrupted Windlune, yet her love for Bloodwind remains intact.
ally.natk: Inflicts damage over time based on a percentage of her normal attack.

ally.name: Bloody Hero Slasher
ally.descr: To Dead Orc Warriors, living beings are mere targets to be slayed. Their swords and armors are bloodstained and they leave dead bodies in their trail.

ally.name: Warrior Rutar
ally.descr: The following words are used to describe him: undefeated and invincible. Enemies kneel before his sword. This is the power of Rutar.

ally.name: Dark Marble Tiehr
ally.descr: Tiehr was born with the gift of magic. Due to her interest in both dark and human magic, she associates with Human Mages to learn their craft.

ally.name: Black Snow
ally.descr: Although her own past is shrouded in mystery, she possesses an encyclopedic knowledge of the world.

ally.name: Priest Ranran
ally.descr: Priest Ranran was trained to control the power of light from an early age. The Porori race is blessed with the power of light at birth.

ally.name: Knight Hui
ally.descr: Knight Hui has the same dream as Tiel. Even hell will wither when she's with Tiel.

ally.name: Wandering Priest
ally.descr: Despite being a wanderer, she is welcome wherever she goes. Underestimate her and you'll pay the price. She is a priestess after all.

ally.name: Wandering Banshee Nun
ally.descr: Banshee is an unfortunate soul that is wandering between life and death. He chases after living creatures not with harmful intentions, but with the desire to feel the warmth of the living again

ally.name: Wandering Banshee Witch
ally.descr: Banshee is an unfortunate soul that is wandering between life and death. He chases after living creatures not with harmful intentions, but with the desire to feel the warmth of the living again.

arenaBuster.label: Arena - Buster

favSetup.allies: Meteor Mage+Gaia, Omega, Gaia, Tiehr, Stigma
Magnify Priest, Epsilon, Omega, Gaia, Tiehr, Ragnarok
Magnify Priest+Epsilon, Omega, Gaia, Tiehr, Pluto

arenaBuster.descr: Balance between AoE Dmg and Single Atk dmg. Meta shifting all the time, there was no jack of all trade team here. but 1 thing is sure, stack as much buster/ds as possible in your team.

lists.name: Dark Soul Tiehr
lists.descr: Best DPS Darksoul for arena in current content. High DMG, Life steal, Hides.

lists.name: Dark Soul Ragnarok
lists.descr: His skills is more toward Arena/PVP, he is able to silent 1 enemy and good offensive skill. Most important is the Dead passive which is one of the most imba at the moment.

lists.name: Dragon Buster Epsilon
lists.descr: Epsilon normal atk is AoE Heal, together with Omega, it will be a healing machine in arena. When atking opponent team, it will deal AoE DMG.

lists.name: Dragon Buster Omega
lists.descr: Omega buff normal atk dmg by 100%, together with Falcon, that will be 200% increase. His AoE stun could help in controlling the crowd and the pt invulnarable buff could help in keeping the team intact.

lists.name: Dragon Buster Gaia
lists.descr: Very powerful AoE DMG, Best mass team clear to have in team.

lists.name: Dragon Buster Pluto
lists.descr: Able to taunt enemies into atking him hence protect allies from possible single atk dmg.

lists.name: Dragon Buster Stigma
lists.descr: Stigma was one of the best Single DMG. But his dmg could be mitigated by invulnarable shield, taunt by pluto.

arenaNonBuster.label: Arena - Hero

favSetup.allies: Magnify Priest, Margaret, Fulson, Falcon, Stormbear
Magnify Priest, Blackaria/Mercedes/Shabelle, Fulson, Falcon, Margaret

arenaNonBuster.descr: Need to balance between DPS & Support (Heal & Tank). Not like in buster league, in hero league, you can still see the role of healer here. At least must have an AoE Dmger and a Single atk ally.

lists.name: Margaret
lists.descr: Margaret have AoE stun which is good crowd control skill. Also she is able to summon another Deity which aid the battle and explodes if the ally still alive after desummon.

lists.name: Drunken Falcon
lists.descr: Falcon able to lock 1 enemy into his book, buff entire pt normal atk, and cast debuff that made enemy killed within a period of time not able to be revived.

lists.name: Envoy Fulson
lists.descr: Best DPS deity in current content. Have the highest single atk dmg. He is kinda like an upgrade version of Rogue Character.

lists.name: Draco Blackaria
lists.descr: One of the best healer deity, her best skill is her death passive which gives invulnarable for 8 sec. she is able to revived 1 fallen ally.

lists.name: Merciful Mercedes
lists.descr: One of the best healer deity, in term of healing she will be better than blackaria. She ia able to give a full revive to a fallen ally and death passive that heal party for 20+ sec.

lists.name: Tinulvian the Poison Fang
lists.descr: A good DPS to have in every situation. use poison debuff to quickly trim down enemies HP and have a very good surviving skill (life steal) that make her good in arena-hero. Her arch nemesis is Priest with Guidance build.

gbBuster.label: Guild Battle - Buster
gbBuster.descr: Current Meta is using Ragnarok, the rest is DPS that aid in clearing enemy team or buff your team.

lists.name: Dark Soul Ragnarok
lists.descr: Currently reign supreme in GB, his death passive is just too ownage.

lists.name: Dark Soul Tiehr
